reviewText: Without a shadow of a doubt; Detroit Pistons is the best NBA team ever. They win games because of their defense. You can ask Michael Jordan ( Greatest player ever). Their hard nose no non sense style of play. Their "blue collar" mentality. The Pistons signify "team" basketball, no egos. This video captures the 1990 Season of the Pistons; which is a must buy for every basketball fan. Go Pistons!!!!
